objects.text:
• Advanced X-Trans CMOS II sensor
   for exceptional image quality
• Premium build with ergonomic
   dial controls for intuitive use
• Compact lightweight body ideal
   for travel photography
* Offer valid until supplies last. Free shipping included.

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Premium Mirrorless Camera - Professional Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled compact mirrorless camera design with durable black finish
• Advanced X-Trans CMOS II sensor for exceptional image quality
• Premium build quality with ergonomic dial controls for intuitive operation
• High-performance interchangeable lens system compatibility
• Electronic viewfinder with real-time preview
• Advanced autofocus system for precise subject tracking
• Wi-Fi connectivity for instant photo sharing and remote control
• Full HD video recording capabilities
• Multiple creative shooting modes and film simulation options
• Compact and lightweight body ideal for travel photography
• Compatible with Fujifilm's extensive X-mount lens collection
• Real-time exposure preview through LCD screen or EVF

banner_details:
This banner is a promotional advertisement featuring a digital camera. The design splits into two sections: a dark gradient left panel with key marketing content and a solid dark right area featuring a product image. The primary heading (`heading`) uses bold uppercase text in white to highlight the deal, supported by a subheading (`subheading`) in red for product branding. A feature list (`description`) offers technical highlights, formatted with bullets. The promotional phrase (`tagline`) emphasizes urgency. Pricing (`price`) is large and red for high visibility. A red rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_background`) contains white uppercase text (`cta`) prompting user interaction. Fine print details appear below (`disclaimer`). The product image (`product_image`) on the right balances the layout, drawing visual focus.

**Color Palette:**
- Jet Black: #1A1A1A
- Dim Gray: #333333
- Charcoal Gray: #222222
- Crimson Red: #E63946
- Bright Red: #F94144
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a Fujifilm X-T10 camera with a sleek, professional aesthetic dominated by deep blacks and metallic tones. The primary color is matte black (#1A1A1A), used across the camera body, giving it a minimalistic and sophisticated look. Subtle highlights of silver-gray (#A6A6A6) and pure white (#FFFFFF) on the labels and logos offer contrast and legibility without overpowering the design. The lens exhibits glass reflections with hues of green (#96C8A2) and amber (#D1904C), which add visual interest and depth. This balanced combination of monochrome with optical accents forms an ideal palette for an advertisement banner to project elegance and precision.
